thought: To craft a birch_button, I first need to craft birch_planks. To craft birch_planks, I need to place 1 birch_log in the crafting table. The birch_log is in slot 41, therefore I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting table.
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1
